name: The 4th Int'l Conference on Soil Remediation and Plant Protection
content: The 4th Int'l Conference on Soil Remediation and Plant Protection (SRPP 2023) will be held during November 25-27, 2023 in Sanya, China. This Conference will cover issues on Soil Science Soil and Global Change, Soil Ecology, Soil Environment, Plant Protection and other Related Topics. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods in related fields.
